snippet.title: UGLY - Early teaser
snippet.description:
(Work in progress)

Ugly is a psycho-dark fairy tale with new mechanics. 
You will have to swap the main character with his own 
reflection to solve puzzles, defeat bosses and discover all 
the secrets in a palace where nothing is what it seems.

visit: http://www.uglythegame.com/
--------------------------------------

Join the ugly side and follow us on your favorite social network:

Twitter:
https://twitter.com/TeamUglyGames
Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/teamuglygames/
Linkedin: 
https://www.linkedin.com/company/team...

#uglythegame
